title: Fresh installation and build hits a Hardhat error
body:
To reproduce:

```bash
gh repo clone ethereum-optimism/optimism
cd optimism
yarn
yarn build
```

Error log:
```
lerna ERR! yarn run build exited 1 in '@eth-optimism/contracts-bedrock'
lerna ERR! yarn run build stdout:
$ hardhat compile && tsc && hardhat typechain

info Visit https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs/cli/run for documentation about this command.
lerna ERR! yarn run build stderr:
Solidity 0.8.10 is not fully supported yet. You can still use Hardhat, but some features, like stack traces, might not work correctly.

Learn more at https://hardhat.org/reference/solidity-support

An unexpected error occurred:
TypeError: Cannot read property 'code' of null
    at analyzeModuleNotFoundError (/Users/liam/code/optimism/optimism/node_modules/hardhat/src/internal/core/config/config-loading.ts:161:13)
    at Environment.run (/Users/liam/code/optimism/optimism/node_modules/hardhat/src/internal/core/runtime-environment.ts:136:33)
    at processTicksAndRejections (internal/process/task_queues.js:95:5)
    at async main (/Users/liam/code/optimism/optimism/node_modules/hardhat/src/internal/cli/cli.ts:218:5)
error Command failed with exit code 1.
lerna ERR! yarn run build exited 1 in '@eth-optimism/contracts-bedrock'
lerna WARN complete Waiting for 2 child processes to exit. CTRL-C to exit immediately.
error Command failed with exit code 1.
info Visit https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs/cli/run for documentation about this command.
error Command failed with exit code 1.
info Visit https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs/cli/run for documentation about this command.
```
